SELECT ("catalogue_product_product_options"."product_id") AS "_prefetch_related_val_product_id", "catalogue_option"."id", "catalogue_option"."name", "catalogue_option"."code", "catalogue_option"."type", "catalogue_option"."required", "catalogue_option"."option_group_id", "catalogue_option"."help_text", "catalogue_option"."order" FROM "catalogue_option" INNER JOIN "catalogue_product_product_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_product_product_options"."option_id") WHERE "catalogue_product_product_options"."product_id" IN (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ORDER BY "catalogue_option"."order" ASC, "catalogue_option"."name" ASC

SELECT ("catalogue_productclass_options"."productclass_id") AS "_prefetch_related_val_productclass_id", "catalogue_option"."id", "catalogue_option"."name", "catalogue_option"."code", "catalogue_option"."type", "catalogue_option"."required", "catalogue_option"."option_group_id", "catalogue_option"."help_text", "catalogue_option"."order" FROM "catalogue_option" INNER JOIN "catalogue_productclass_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_productclass_options"."option_id") WHERE "catalogue_productclass_options"."productclass_id" IN (?) ORDER BY "catalogue_option"."order" ASC, "catalogue_option"."name" ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "__count" FROM "catalogue_product" WHERE ("catalogue_product"."is_public" AND "catalogue_product"."parent_id" IS ?)

SELECT "catalogue_category"."id", "catalogue_category"."path", "catalogue_category"."depth", "catalogue_category"."numchild", "catalogue_category"."name", "catalogue_category"."description", "catalogue_category"."meta_title", "catalogue_category"."meta_description", "catalogue_category"."image", "catalogue_category"."slug", "catalogue_category"."is_public", "catalogue_category"."ancestors_are_public" FROM "catalogue_category" WHERE ("catalogue_category"."ancestors_are_public" AND "catalogue_category"."is_public") ORDER BY "catalogue_category"."path" ASC

SELECT "catalogue_category"."id", "catalogue_category"."path", "catalogue_category"."depth", "catalogue_category"."numchild", "catalogue_category"."name", "catalogue_category"."description", "catalogue_category"."meta_title", "catalogue_category"."meta_description", "catalogue_category"."image", "catalogue_category"."slug", "catalogue_category"."is_public", "catalogue_category"."ancestors_are_public" FROM "catalogue_category" WHERE ("catalogue_category"."depth" <= ? AND "catalogue_category"."ancestors_are_public" AND "catalogue_category"."is_public") ORDER BY "catalogue_category"."path" ASC

SELECT "catalogue_option"."id", "catalogue_option"."name", "catalogue_option"."code", "catalogue_option"."type", "catalogue_option"."required", "catalogue_option"."option_group_id", "catalogue_option"."help_text", "catalogue_option"."order" FROM "catalogue_option" LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_productclass_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_productclass_options"."option_id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_product_product_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_product_product_options"."option_id") WHERE ("catalogue_productclass_options"."productclass_id" = ? OR "catalogue_product_product_options"."product_id" = ?) ORDER BY "catalogue_option"."order" ASC, "catalogue_option"."name" ASC

SELECT "catalogue_product"."id", "catalogue_product"."structure", "catalogue_product"."is_public", "catalogue_product"."upc", "catalogue_product"."parent_id", "catalogue_product"."title", "catalogue_product"."slug", "catalogue_product"."description", "catalogue_product"."meta_title", "catalogue_product"."meta_description", "catalogue_product"."product_class_id", "catalogue_product"."rating", "catalogue_product"."date_created", "catalogue_product"."date_updated", "catalogue_product"."is_discountable" FROM "catalogue_product" WHERE "catalogue_product"."parent_id" IN (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ORDER BY "catalogue_product"."date_created" DESC

SELECT "catalogue_product"."id", "catalogue_product"."structure", "catalogue_product"."is_public", "catalogue_product"."upc", "catalogue_product"."parent_id", "catalogue_product"."title", "catalogue_product"."slug", "catalogue_product"."description", "catalogue_product"."meta_title", "catalogue_product"."meta_description", "catalogue_product"."product_class_id", "catalogue_product"."rating", "catalogue_product"."date_created", "catalogue_product"."date_updated", "catalogue_product"."is_discountable", EXISTS(SELECT ? AS "a" FROM "catalogue_option" U0 INNER JOIN "catalogue_productclass_options" U1 ON (U0."id" = U1."option_id") WHERE U1."productclass_id" = ("catalogue_product"."product_class_id") LIMIT ?) AS "has_product_class_options", EXISTS(SELECT ? AS "a" FROM "catalogue_option" U0 INNER JOIN "catalogue_product_product_options" U1 ON (U0."id" = U1."option_id") WHERE U1."product_id" = ("catalogue_product"."id") LIMIT ?) AS "has_product_options", "catalogue_productclass"."id", "catalogue_productclass"."name", "catalogue_productclass"."slug", "catalogue_productclass"."requires_shipping", "catalogue_productclass"."track_stock" FROM "catalogue_product" LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_productclass" ON ("catalogue_product"."product_class_id" = "catalogue_productclass"."id") WHERE ("catalogue_product"."is_public" AND "catalogue_product"."parent_id" IS ?) ORDER BY "catalogue_product"."date_created" DESC LIMIT ?

SELECT "catalogue_productimage"."id", "catalogue_productimage"."product_id", "catalogue_productimage"."original", "catalogue_productimage"."caption", "catalogue_productimage"."display_order", "catalogue_productimage"."date_created" FROM "catalogue_productimage" WHERE "catalogue_productimage"."product_id" IN (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ORDER BY "catalogue_productimage"."display_order" ASC
